meanings.definition: A group of friends or companions.
meanings.sent1: My boyos and I love playing soccer together.
meanings.sent2: She invited her boyos to her birthday party.
meanings.sent3: The boyos had a great time at the amusement park.
meanings.sent4: The boyos stuck together through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The boyos shared many adventures together.

meanings.sent1: The boyos cheers could be heard from across the field.
meanings.sent2: She had a boyos reaction when she won the game.
meanings.sent3: The boyos crowd erupted in cheers.
meanings.sent5: The boyos celebration lasted all night.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a young boy.
meanings.sent1: My little boyos always makes me smile.
meanings.sent2: She hugged her boyos tightly before he left for school.
meanings.sent3: The boyos gave his mom a big hug.
meanings.sent4: Her boyos had the brightest smile.
meanings.sent5: The boyos ran to his mom with excitement.
